text: The Brink's Job is a 1978 American crime comedy drama movie directed by William Friedkin and based on the novel Big Stick-Up at Brinks by Noel Behn. It stars Peter Falk, Peter Boyle, Allen Garfield, Warren Oates, Gena Rowlands, Paul Sorvino. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was nominated for an Oscar in 1979. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1978 crime drama movies Category:1978 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s criminal comedy movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by William Friedkin Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:American heist movies Category:Movies set in Boston Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:1970s American crime movies Category:Movies based on real life events
title: The Brink's Job
